name: exlimdd
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))

|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, w2), w1)

comment: Existential elimination rule of natural deduction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2017.)
